species.name: salazzle
descriptions: Filled with pheromones, its poisonous gas can be diluted to use in the production of luscious perfumes.
For some reason, only females have been found. It creates a reverse harem of male Salandit that it lives with.
It punishes Salandit that couldn’t bring it food with a fierce slap of its flame-spewing palm.
Only female Salazzle exist. They emit a gas laden with pheromones to captivate male Salandit.
Salazzle lives deep in caves and forces the Salandit it has attracted with its pheromones to serve it.

abilities.name: corrosion
abilities.effect: This Pokémon can inflict poison on Poison and Steel Pokémon.

abilities.name: oblivious
abilities.effect: Prevents infatuation and protects against captivate.
